title: Brother's Ilk
description: There are doctors that will push the boundaries of science and the laws of nature to get to their ultimate goal.Trapped in a house at the end of it all, decisions have to be made, no matter how hard.Some women have secrets buried so deep, in places you would never guess.A ticket to a play can turn into a ride to Hell…and madness.Take a photo; chase a story, but watch for the candles.What would you do to reclaim your old glory, to be the star you once were?Brother’s Ilk is a collection by brothers Shaun Meeks (At the Gates of Madness) and James Meeks. 15 tales that ride a roller coaster of horrors, moving from the bizarre to the sublime, and includes a novella by each.
author: Shaun Meeks
